section.name: Download AndroMDApp Maven Plugin
section.p: The fastest way to get started with AndroMDA is to install and use it to generate an AndroMDA powered application.

To download and install the plugin into your maven plugin, first make sure you are pointing to the AndroMDA team server in your maven.repo.remote property (i.e. maven.repo.remote=http://www.ibiblio.org/maven,http://team.andromda.org/maven). Then type:
maven plugin:download -DgroupId=andromda -DartifactId=maven-andromdapp-plugin -Dversion=3.0-RC2
